name: medi-ai-suite
description: Comprehensive healthtech application with AI-powered wound detection, medicine scanning, and emergency response

scripts.install:all: yarn install && yarn workspace mobile install && yarn workspace web install && yarn workspace backend install
scripts.dev: concurrently "yarn workspace mobile start" "yarn workspace web start" "yarn workspace backend start"
scripts.build: yarn workspace mobile build && yarn workspace web build
scripts.test: yarn workspace mobile test && yarn workspace web test && yarn workspace backend test
scripts.lint: yarn workspace mobile lint && yarn workspace web lint && yarn workspace backend lint
scripts.deploy: yarn workspace mobile deploy && yarn workspace web deploy && yarn workspace backend deploy

author: Medi-AI Team
